```{r, include = FALSE}
#load libraries
library(learnr)
library(downloadthis)
```

## ggplot activity  
  
Click the following button to download an R markdown file that contains ggplot exercises

```{r, echo = FALSE}
#make temp file
temp_rmd <- tempfile(pattern = "3-ggplot_activity_file_", 
                     fileext = ".Rmd")
#download file to temp file
download.file(url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matthewhirschey/tidybiology.org/master/code/3-objects/3-ggplot_activity.Rmd", 
              destfile = temp_rmd)

#download button
downloadthis::download_file(
  path = temp_rmd,
  button_label = "Download Rmd",
  button_type = "danger",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = TRUE
)
```

And here's another R markdown file with the answers
